job_history.work_description: Assisted in all payroll duties including but not limited to: accounting for all employee hours worked, time off requests, STD, leave of absence, etc. Worked quickly and efficiently, with minimal oversight, to accomplish assigned duties. Accurately processed data, validation and transmission for weekly, semi-monthly and sales payrolls. Managed payroll and time and attendance systems.

Provide professional and prompt financial services to all members and potential members in a sales and service culture, while continually educating members on credit union products and services in relation to the members' needs.
Ordering and serving the customers with excellent service. Finding solutions to customer related issues. Insuring that all duties at the closing and opening of the store were done correctly.
Assist Manager with all visuals for entire store. Responsible for delegating and planning daily staff workflow, in the absence of the store manager.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled all payroll duties, including accounting for employee hours, time off requests, and leave of absence, with minimal oversight, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Assisted in payroll duties and managed payroll and time and attendance systems, showing a solid working proficiency in accounting.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided professional and prompt financial services to members and potential members, and handled customer-related issues, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Delegated and planned daily staff workflow, and assisted manager with store visuals, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Worked quickly and efficiently to accomplish assigned duties, indicating a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Financial Services
skills.explanation: Provided financial services to members and potential members, but the extent of experience is not clear, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Sales
skills.explanation: Worked in a sales and service culture, but the extent of experience is not clear, suggesting some practical experience.
